document.full_text: in palau, the maldives, the bahamas and some other scuba-diving destinations, tourism operators have gotten across the message to governments that there are economically rational reasons to protect the fish.
document.title: putting a price on sharks
lines_and_colors: in palau, the maldives, the bahamas and some other scuba-diving destinations, tourism operators have gotten across the message to governments that there are economically rational reasons to protect the fish.
